title: The Alcohol problem: what do you think?
creator_credit: Michael Ahnemann, Milan Herzog, Stanley Croner and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A film in three parts: Part 1 looks at the social, historical and economic aspects of alcohol; Part 2 analyses the chemistry of alcohol and the physiological effects of drinking and Part 3 shows experiments with mice revealing the physical dependency and withdrawal symptoms caused by alcoholism. Also visits a hospital and talks to youthful alcoholics. Suitable for secondary school level.
